name: Cherry Rescue!
overview: Barry's sister, Mary, has been captured by a mysterious foe, and you must rescue her! Run, jump, and stomp the baddies who stand in your way, and get to the end of each level unscathed! CONTROLS: Z / J = A button (Talk to people) X / K = B button (Jumping) Enter = Start (Pause game) WASD / Arrow keys to move + up and down ladders Website = https://grafxkid.itch.io/cherry-rescue
